TEXT.P: Data for carbon monoxide (CO) has been added to the table at left.

Because it can bind irreversibly to hemoglobin, interrupting the supply of oxygen to cells, CO is a dangerous air pollutant even in small concentrations. Incomplete combustion of fuels is the primary source of carbon monoxide.
Inspect the emission data for CO. How would you need to change the scale of this graph to add the CO data to it?
